name: Soul Property: Who's Life is it Anyway?
name_original: Soul Property: Who's Life is it Anyway?
description:
Harvest souls to pay off your debt! Kill everyone to score souls, but don't get hit or you'll lose them - and having no souls puts your own soul at risk!

WASD/arrow keys to move

Spacebar to fly - watch your Fly Juice!

Left mouse or left ctrl to attack.
